description:
The protagonist. Takayuki Narumi meets Haruka a year before Mitsuki sets them up during their third year of high school.
When he witnesses the still fresh pool of blood next to Haruka`s bloodied hair ribbons lying among the shattered glass of the phone booth as the officer in charge of the scene identifies Haruka from her student ID, he develops post-traumatic stress disorder.
name: Narumi Takayuki
